title: Please rethink Cassiopeia number nerfs
body:
I really just don't agree with the Cass nerfs on the pbe.  After all this time she's finally stable again, and you guys are like halving the heal AND simultaneously nerf the mana gain?   Don't punish good cass players for getting a lot of stacks, instead here's an idea:


Remove the slow when she misses her ult stun!

Bam, suddenly she can't just force an engage even when shes behind, and the good cass players are now separated from the bad!  It's not even a large heal anyway, there's absolutely no reason to nerf it.  I really, really hope some riot ppl consider this.

replies.body: I think it was an overnerf, she kind of needed a little tweak, but they gutted her mana sustain in half and ALSO they nerfed her passive spell vamp ratio from 0.1 to 0.06, they shouldn't go so hard. Meanwhile the infinite sustainable, lord of all trades {{champion:31}} remains untouched.
She just needs another rework, she's a machine gun snake not a Poison Mage. I'll admit, I love playing the current Cassiopeia but they strayed to far away from what they wanted her to be.
